title: Add smooth transition animation when opening Program Detail drawer

requirements.text: Add a subtle, smooth open/close transition for the Program Detail drawer/sheet (frontend/src/components/program-calendar/ProgramDetailDrawer.tsx) so that when a program is opened from the calendar or programs list, the panel animates in with a gentle fade + slide (slide from the right on desktop, slide up from the bottom on mobile) and animates out on close.

quotes: Buatkan transisi halu saat membuka detail program

acceptanceCriteria: Opening Program Detail animates in smoothly (fade + directional slide) and feels responsive (no jank).
Closing Program Detail animates out smoothly (reverse animation) without leaving the UI in a visually broken state.
Desktop/right drawer uses a horizontal slide-in; mobile/bottom sheet uses a vertical slide-up motion.
Animation respects reduced-motion preferences (if the user has prefers-reduced-motion enabled, the animation is disabled or significantly minimized).
No edits are made to any files under frontend/src/components/ui; the animation is applied via composition (e.g., className) in ProgramDetailDrawer.

constraints: Do not modify any read-only shadcn UI sources under frontend/src/components/ui; apply transitions by composing/adding classes in app-level components only.
Keep the backend unchanged; this is a UI-only enhancement.
nonGoals: Redesigning the Program Detail content layout or changing the information shown in the drawer.
Adding new program fields, backend APIs, or changing program selection/navigation logic.
